item.title: Rouge
item.dc:creator: @KFC KFC
item.description:
@KFC wrote:

[quote=“gunz4life, post:8, topic:457130”]In the Thieving.java file (src > server > model > players > skills) under:

	public Thieving(Client c) {
		this.c = c;
	}

add:

public boolean fullRogue() {
	if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerHat] == 5554 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerChest] == 5553 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerLegs] == 5555 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerHands] == 5556 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerFeet] == 5557) {
		return true;
	}
        return false; 
}

Replace your stealFromStall method with:

	public void stealFromStall(int itemID, int itemAmt, int xp, int level) {
		if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastThieve < 2500)
			return;
		if (Misc.random(100) == 0) {
			return;
		}
		if (c.playerLevel[c.playerThieving] >= level) {
				if (fullRogue() && itemID == 995) {
					c.getItems().addItem(itemID, itemAmt * 3);
				} else {
					c.getItems().addItem(itemID, itemAmt);
				}
				c.startAnimation(832);
				c.getPA().addSkillXP(xp * Config.THIEVING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerThieving);
				c.lastThieve = System.currentTimeMillis();
				c.sendMessage("You steal a " + server.model.items.Item.getItemName(itemID) + ".");
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("You must have a thieving level of " + level + " to thieve from this stall.");
		}
	}

Now open up ActionHandler.java (src > server > model > players) and search for:

			case 6163:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(1897, 10, 1);
			break;
			case 6165:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(950, 30, 25);
			break;
			case 6166:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(1635, 60, 50);
			break;
			case 6164:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(7650, 100, 75);
			break;
			case 6162:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(1613, 170, 90);
			break;

replace ALL of that code with:

			case 6163:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 1000, 10, 1);
			break;
			case 6165:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(955, 2000, 30, 25);
			break;
			case 6166:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 3000, 60, 50);
			break;
			case 6164:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 4000, 100, 75);
			break;
			case 6162:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 5000, 170, 90);
			break;

This should work, it’ll only 3x the loot if they’re wearing full rogue & they’re looting money[/quote]
This is exactly what I needed, thanks so so so so much!! But one problem, after Compiling, I am getting 10 errors
EDIT: If it’s easier, I can Skype you, or use Teamviewer or anything? up to you.

Read full topic

item.title: Rouge
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

In the Thieving.java file (src > server > model > players > skills) under:

	public Thieving(Client c) {
		this.c = c;
	}

add:

public boolean fullRogue() {
	if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerHat] == 5554 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerChest] == 5553 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerLegs] == 5555 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerHands] == 5556 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerFeet] == 5557) {
		return true;
	}
        return false; 
}

Replace your stealFromStall method with:

	public void stealFromStall(int itemID, int itemAmt, int xp, int level) {
		if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastThieve < 2500)
			return;
		if (Misc.random(100) == 0) {
			return;
		}
		if (c.playerLevel[c.playerThieving] >= level) {
				if (fullRogue() && itemID == 995) {
					c.getItems().addItem(itemID, itemAmt * 3);
				} else {
					c.getItems().addItem(itemID, itemAmt);
				}
				c.startAnimation(832);
				c.getPA().addSkillXP(xp * Config.THIEVING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerThieving);
				c.lastThieve = System.currentTimeMillis();
				c.sendMessage("You steal a " + server.model.items.Item.getItemName(itemID) + ".");
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("You must have a thieving level of " + level + " to thieve from this stall.");
		}
	}

Now open up ActionHandler.java (src > server > model > players) and search for:

			case 6163:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(1897, 10, 1);
			break;
			case 6165:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(950, 30, 25);
			break;
			case 6166:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(1635, 60, 50);
			break;
			case 6164:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(7650, 100, 75);
			break;
			case 6162:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(1613, 170, 90);
			break;

replace ALL of that code with:

			case 6163:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 1000, 10, 1);
			break;
			case 6165:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(955, 2000, 30, 25);
			break;
			case 6166:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 3000, 60, 50);
			break;
			case 6164:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 4000, 100, 75);
			break;
			case 6162:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 5000, 170, 90);
			break;

This should work, it’ll only 3x the loot if they’re wearing full rogue & they’re looting money

item.title: Rouge
item.dc:creator: @KFC KFC
item.description:
@KFC wrote:

gunz4life:

Can you post your stealFromStall method here? Its located in the Thieving.java file (Location: src > server > model > players > skills)

Here you go;

public void stealFromStall(int id, int xp, int level) {
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastThieve < 2500)
return;
if (c.playerLevel[c.playerThieving] >= level) {
if(Misc.random(12) == 1) {
c.sendMessage(“You get caught trying to thieve the stall…”);
c.startAnimation(3679);
if(c.playerLevel[3] <= 30) {
appendHit(Misc.random(4), c);
} else {
appendHit(Misc.random(10), c);
return;
}
}
c.sendMessage(“You attempt to steal something from the stall…”);
c.getItems().addItem(id, 1);
c.startAnimation(832);
c.getItems().addItem(995, c.playerLevel[c.playerThieving] * 250);
c.getPA().addSkillXP(xp * Config.THIEVING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerThieving);
c.lastThieve = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.sendMessage("You steal a " + server.model.items.Item.getItemName(id) + “.”);
}
else if(c.playerLevel[17] < level) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a theiving level of “+level+” to theif from this stall.”);
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Rouge
item.dc:creator: @KFC KFC
item.description:
@KFC wrote:

[quote=“gunz4life, post:2, topic:457130”]Search for this in Client.java:

public void switchBooks() {

Above that method, add this (Make sure you replace the #### with the rogue item ids):

public boolean fullRogue() { if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == #### && playerEquipment[playerChest] == #### && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == #### && playerEquipment[playerHands] == #### && playerEquipment[playerFeet] == ####) { return true; } return false; }

In Client.java still, replace your TheifStall method with this:

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) {
	if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return;
		if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
   			actionInterval = 4000;
   			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
   			setAnimation(emote);
   			sM("You take from the stall..");
   			sM(message);
			if (fullRogue()) {
   				addItem(item, itemAmount * 3);
			} else {
				addItem(item, itemAmount);
			}
   			addSkillXP(XPamount, 17);
  		}else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) {
  			sM("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall.");
 		}
}

This SHOULD] work assuming your using a Delta base?[/quote]

I’ll test it out. I’ll be with you within 5 mins. Thanks very much.

EDIT: My client.java cannot even find “public void switchBooks() {”

item.title: Rouge
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

Search for this in Client.java:

public void switchBooks() {

Above that method, add this (Make sure you replace the #### with the rogue item ids):

public boolean fullRogue() { if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == #### && playerEquipment[playerChest] == #### && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == #### && playerEquipment[playerHands] == #### && playerEquipment[playerFeet] == ####) { return true; } return false; }

In Client.java still, replace your TheifStall method with this:

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) {
	if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return;
		if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
   			actionInterval = 4000;
   			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
   			setAnimation(emote);
   			sM("You take from the stall..");
   			sM(message);
                        if (fullRogue()) {
                                addItem(item, itemAmount * 3);
                        } else {
                                addItem(item, itemAmount);
                        }
   			addSkillXP(XPamount, 17);
  		}else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) {
  			sM("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall.");
 		}
}

This SHOULD work assuming your using a Delta base?

item.title: Rouge
item.dc:creator: @KFC KFC
item.description:
@KFC wrote:

I wanted to make it so that wearing a full set of Rogue would 3x the amount of money from each stall you thieve from…
I have the pieces of code, I just don’t know where to put them… Can anyone help?

public boolean fullRogue(){
return(playerEquipment[playerChest] == xxxx
&& playerEquipment[playerLegs] == xxxx
&& playerEquipment[playerHat] == xxxx
&& playerEquipment[playerHands] == xxxx
&& playerEquipment[playerFeet] == xxxx);
}

if(!fullRogue()){
addItem(995, 10);
}
if(fullRogue()){
addItem(995, 30);
}

Read full topic
